entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this morning. Rain beginning early this morning. Fog patches. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 this morning. High 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Monday 1 May 2023
